2 KG LOAD CAPACITY: This folding washing machine features 2 kg or 4.41 lbs. wash capacity. Perfect for washing light clothes that require separate cleanings like baby clothes, underwear, towels, socks, T-shirts, tank tops, toys, or other small items

FOLDABLE DESIGN: Pure Clean foldable laundry tub washing machine features a foldable and portable bucket type design for easy storage When not in use. Can easily fit under the stool or under the bed and will not take up much space in your house
EASY TO OPERATE: This pop up washing machine features a semi-automatic cleaning function and is equipped with a 15-minute timer knob that automatically resets after completion

PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT: The bucket washing machine folds in a compact size of 11.64" x 11.64" x 6.4" so you can easily carry it out and conveniently wash clothes outdoors. Perfect for camping, vacation, business trip, apartments, dorms

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cleaning and Maintenance After Washing When the washing process is completed, please drain the sewage in the washing machine to avoid changing the water quality for a long time. After use, please wipe the whole machine clean, and fold the washing machine according to the method of folding the washing machine, and put the cover on the top. WASHING MACHINE OPERATION Put the clothes to be washed into the washing bucket, and then put in an appropriate amount of detergent Pour in an appropriate amount of water (water should completely cover the clothes, and the level of the water is better to higher than clothes for about 3~5cm). Put the cover plate on the tub, turn on the washer timer, switch it to "15min" position, then the machine begins to work automatically After the program is over, the timer resets automatically and the machine stops working. Take out the laundry clothes. Disconnect the adapter from the washing machine and socket. Choose an appropriate drainage method to drain the water out of the washing machine. Wipe the Machine

WASHING CLOTHES Weightless than 1.8KG, such as underwear, socks, etc... Since the washing machine is a single washing machine after the washing process is completed. Take out the clothes manually to wring them out or put them in the dehydration machine for dehydration DRAINAGE 1. Lower drainage: Pull out the plug of the outlet on the pedestal, the machine begins to drain water naturally, and then insert the plug into the outlet after the water drains. 2. Upper drainage: In order to drain the water fast, you can choose manual upper drainage. Shut of the electricity first and disconnect the product and the power. Grab the handle and the hole of the pedestal, lean the upper outlet downward, and then drain o the water CLOTHING PRE-TREATMENT In order to avoid clogging the drain n pipe and a ecting the performance of the washing machine. Please remove obvious sod, bars, etc. inside and outside of the clothes in advance, and then put the clothes into the washing machine CLOTHING PLACEMENT In order to ensure better washing e ect, please open the clothes, int the washing bucket, so as not to cause the washing e ect to be unsatisfactory due to the knots of the clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Clothes Are Awesome
reviews.reviewText: We like to go camping and fishing, but even after packing for days, there isn't enough room in the car for all seven of us. I purchased it so that we wouldn't have to bring as much and so that we could wash our clothes while on vacation. This bucket-style portable washing machine is suitable for camping. Even if it only washes a few items at once, camping gives you plenty of time to do the task.This is convenient to take with you because it is lightweight and folds up small, making it simple to pack and transport. It is a bucket-style washer that washes clothing outside. The washer uses high-frequency vibration to thoroughly remove dirt while leaving no residue or allergens behind. It has a semi-automatic cleaning mechanism and a 15-minute timer knob that automatically resets when finished.Despite its compact size, this portable washing machine performs admirably. I just added the water, detergent, and laundry, then turned the dial to the appropriate time. When I was finished, I could start a new load. It is reasonably priced, performs effectively, and would be beneficial in an emergency event such as storms, power shortages, and other similar situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but mighty
reviews.reviewText: This portable washing machines is perfect to wash an adult outfit or even jeans when you’re in a a pinch or need to wash them separately from the rest of the clothes. It compact and able to be folded down but when expanded I was quite impressed with how much it can hold. Larger than other portable washing machines on the market right now ( I have purchased 2 others before this one). I run the cycle twice for my clothes, the first one with water and detergent to clean my clothes and a second time to rinse it after draining the water out and adding in new water. Definitely beats hand washing the clothes myself. Easy timer dial on the front so that I can pick the cycle length and let the machine do its job. It can hold an adult outfit and a little more. It’s not only for undergarments and baby clothes. I’m actually quite impressed with this machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for small loads of laundry and items
reviews.reviewText: I bought this washer because I thought it also came with a spin cycle. Turns out it didn't, so I bought a cuisnart salad spinner and it's surprisingly good at getting most of the water out. I also already have a bucket at home so it wasn't a big deal filling the washer up myself instead of hooking it up to the sink like other washers. It's small enough to fit on the kitchen counter. It's not as quiet as I hoped it would be since I'm a little paranoid about my neighbors complaining. To me, it sounds like a dishwasher running. I would run it for two 15 min wash cycles then a 6 min rinse cycle to get the soap out. I read the other reviews and a little goes a long way for liquid detergent. My clothes came out smelling clean for the most part (except for one shirt that has a stubborn deodorant and sweat odor). I was able to wash my shirts (medium size in women's), undergarments, and pillow cases. I didn't wash any small towels because this washer doesn't have a lint collector and I didn't find any good ones to throw into the wash to collect lint. I did however make sure to have a mesh sink strainer to catch any lint. And I've read one review that said the towels would also leave lint all over the washer and next load of laundry. I think if you have heavily soiled clothes, it's best to use a regular washer but this works for light to normal soiled clothes. The only downside is that you can only wash a few items at a time and it's get tiring especially from wringing all the water out. And the motor overheats after 2 uses. I wait 1 hr between each load so the motor cools down. Overall, it's not bad if you need to only do small loads for small items and you can handle the 1 hr wait between each load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the size and easy to use
